content.query:
CREATE TABLE TrafficViolation (
    LogId varchar(50),
    ViolationPatternId varchar(50),
    StatusId varchar(50),
    DocumentNumber varchar(50),
    OperationTeam varchar(100),
    Dear varchar(100),
    VehicleOwner varchar(100), 
    DOB datetime,
    Address varchar(255),
    LocationViolation varchar(255),
    Description varchar(1000),
    Coordinate varchar(50),
    SettlementAgency varchar(100),
    DateTranfer datetime,
    DateSolving datetime,
    ExtraData varchar(4000),
    ID varchar(50),
    CreatedAt datetime,
    UpdatedAt datetime, 
    DeletedAt datetime
)
